name: Join
description:
A & D to move right and left. Space to jump (p.s you can jump repeatedly)

Well what a journey it was to make my first brand new game. I certainly cannot believe it! Join is a skill and physics based 2d plat former where one must traverse through an almost impossible obstacle to join (join like the title… get it..) with the other "rectangles". Hope you all enjoy!

Checkout my website at, waitgames.wordpress.com

Music: TheFatRat-Unity(instrumental)
